channel.title: Data on Jack Olney
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Jack Olney

item.title: Rapid access to health data in the UK
item.description:
In the field of public health, there is a need to access health and healthcare-related data much faster than ever before.

A pertinent example of this is the current coronavirus outbreak (COVID-19). In early February 2020, merely days after the first cases were confirmed in the UK, the Department of Health and Social Care along with UK Research & Innovation announced a Â£20M investment to facilitate rapid research on the virus by world-class UK academic and industry experts1. Encouragingly, this announcement was met with great interest across the sector and my hope is this funding will enable us to ultimately control the current outbreak.
